intro.title: Introduction
content: Dielema (死了么) is a revolutionary proof-of-life protocol designed to solve the critical problem of digital asset inheritance. In the event of unexpected tragedy, your hard-earned crypto assets remain locked forever-until now.

Our smart contract system allows you to designate a successor for your on-chain fortune while maintaining complete control. By periodically submitting a proof of life, you keep your assets active. If the unexpected happens, your assets automatically transfer to your chosen beneficiary.
Built for multi-chain compatibility, Dielema works across BSC, Ethereum, Polygon, and Solana, ensuring your digital legacy is protected regardless of which blockchain you use.

problem.title: The Problem
content: Every year, millions of dollars worth of cryptocurrency are lost forever because private keys die with their owners. Unlike traditional banking, there is no central authority to handle inheritance when someone passes away unexpectedly.
Without proper inheritance planning:
• Assets remain inaccessible forever
• Families face legal battles and technical hurdles
• Wealth intended for loved ones is permanently lost
• No mechanism to prove owner demise
Current solutions require trust in third parties or complex legal arrangements that may not be technically feasible or enforceable across borders.

solution.title: The Dielemma Solution
content: Dielemma solves this through an elegant smart contract system:
1. Create Deposit: Deposit your assets into a smart contract with a designated successor (receiver) and timeout period.
2. Proof of Life: Before timeout expires, submit a transaction proving you're alive. This resets the timer and requires burning 1 DLM token.
3. Auto-Transfer: If you fail to submit proof of life before timeout, the assets automatically transfer to your designated successor.
Key Features:
• No trust required - Smart contracts execute automatically
• Multi-chain support - Works on BSC, Ethereum, Polygon, Solana
• Flexible timeouts - Set hours, days, or months
• Revocable - Withdraw anytime while alive
• Transparent - All transactions visible on blockchain
• Secure - Battle-tested smart contract code
